holes.original_proof:
intro n
induction n using Nat.strong_induction_on with
| h n ih =>
  match n with
  | 0 => norm_num [hT012, Nat.factorial]
  | 1 => norm_num [hT012, Nat.factorial]
  | 2 => norm_num [hT012, Nat.factorial]
  | 3 =>
    norm_num [hT012, hTn, Nat.factorial] at * <;> (try decide) <;> (try ring_nf at *) <;> (try norm_num at *) <;>
      (try linarith)
  | n + 4 =>
    have h₃ := hTn (n + 1)
    have h₄ := hTn n
    have h₅ := hTn (n + 2)
    have h₆ := hTn (n + 3)
    simp [ih, Nat.factorial, pow_succ, Nat.mul_add, Nat.add_mul] at h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ ⊢ <;> ring_nf at h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ ⊢ <;>
                  norm_cast at h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ ⊢ <;>
                (try omega) <;>
              (try ring_nf at *) <;>
            (try norm_num at *) <;>
          (try linarith) <;>
        (try nlinarith) <;>
      (try ring_nf at * <;> norm_num at * <;> nlinarith)
